Keywords: Brute , Enforcers , Maggia , Sinister Syndicate
Real Name: Joseph
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: This character can move through Blocking terrain. Immediately after movement resolves, destroy all Blocking terrain moved through.
YET ANOTHER SINISTER SIX: When an adjacent friendly character with the Sinister Syndicate keyword begins a move, they can use [Improved Movement: This character can move through Blocking terrain. Immediately after movement resolves, destroy all Blocking terrain moved through.] during that move.
STRAIGHT TO THE TOP, HEAD FIRST: Charge. When he uses it, modify damage +1.
LEMME INTRODUCE MY FRIEND TOMMY: Hammerhead has a range of 5 and 2 targets.

@dAlth.....check again. It's the last one on the list, far right. I love that we got a modern age of this guy. I like his options, that traited charge is very handy to have, especially paired with sidestep. I like that every time I thought about attacking a character, I had options. Range, close, sidestep to position me within PC of other characters, etc. Not a gamebreaker, but just a fun piece. The only downside to sealed was not having sinister syndicate to play off of his trait. I can imagine how helpful it will be to have them tearing through walls and blocking as needed. That will really improve my Earth X synister team.
